API_Description: Returns the index of the current page being viewed in the document.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'getCurPageIndex' suggests it retrieves the current page index, which is a common functionality in document viewing contexts.
Returns: The 0-based index of the current page being viewed.
Returns_Reason: The method likely returns a number representing the page index, as indicated by the method name and typical behavior of similar methods in document APIs.
